Articles.Content:
Gets severed leg.

Inserts snacks.

Gets a SUPER HOT SPICY MEAT BURRITO CHILI GRILL with SUPER SPICY CHEESE NACHOS and a SUPER EXTRA LARGE DR. PEPPER ROOT BEER.

Inserts aforementioned severed leg.

Gets a severed foot.

Inserts nacho cheese...Yes, in liquid form.

Gets a severed head, with "YOU KILLED MATUCHKIN" written in blood (and nacho cheese) on the forehead.

Inserts severed foot.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-02-14T21:50:43Z" title="02/14/2016 09:50  PM" data-short="8 yr">February 14, 2016</time> by Matuchkin**

Gets severed toe.

Inserts severed toe.

Gets bloody finger nail.

Inserts said finger nail.

Vending machine gives a frown and spits out a can of coke. (Gee thanks!)

Insert no coins.

Gets a list of wild swears.

Inserts Asinus. (Use Google translator!)

Gets kicked.

inserts [@ZentroCatson](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/143939-zentrocatson/) (yeah, you're the one who dies now) ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif ":cool:")

Gets a $sqrt2 bill.

Inserts globe of Kerbin.

Gets globe of Dres.

Inserts Bugatti Veyron.

Gets a VW Käfer.

Inserts antimatter.

Vending machine explodes as it is made of regular matter.

Goes to new vending machine, inserts sea turtle.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-03-09T13:23:31Z" title="03/09/2016 01:23  PM" data-short="8 yr">March 9, 2016</time> by cubinator**

Receive bowl of turtle soup.

Insert potato

Recieve a scalding hot potato

Insert Burning hands

Gets nice, cool oxygen gas

Inserts spacebar

**Edited <time datetime="2016-03-12T02:18:42Z" title="03/12/2016 02:18  AM" data-short="8 yr">March 12, 2016</time> by cubinator**

Receives shot of Bushmill's 10-year malt.

Inserts empty shotglass...

Gets shot with molten glass gun.

Inserts drawing of the impossible triangle

Gets an Error saying 'Out of Toner'.

Inserts Astronaut Ice Cream

Gets an actual blended astronaut.

Inserts "NO" cat meme.  
[![483ef0911f5e27073a015b45aee7a288b9c8d3bf](http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/48/483ef0911f5e27073a015b45aee7a288b9c8d3bfa104f8bfe6625572f97cfa52.jpg)](http://www.quickmeme.com/meme/3r2jed)

Gets another vending machine.

Inserts a Alucard meme.

![images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRCOCbZuXVsBf5wqzAovfM](https://encrypted-tbn3.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRCOCbZuXVsBf5wqzAovfMdhz40IcqdbSkH8ok6wkbf4BoA44D6jLyDf-4UjA)

Gets big explosions.

inserts big rocket.

Gets pile of broken rocket parts.

Inserts [@Red Iron Crown](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/12858-red-iron-crown/)

Gets 5 explosions and a computer crash.

Inserts 2 1250 rockets.

Gets error saying: "1250 whats?"

Inserts Chrome (the web browser).
